en: After the flood, God’s story continues through families and generations.
This line of descendants leads from Noah to Abram (later called Abraham and known as Ibrahim in Arabic).

lines: Noah was the father of Shem.
Shem was the father of Arphaxad.
Arphaxad was the father of Shelah.
Shelah was the father of Eber.
Eber was the father of Peleg.
Peleg was the father of Reu.
Reu was the father of Serug.
Serug was the father of Nahor.
Nahor was the father of Terah.
Terah was the father of Abram.
These names show that God is not only working in one moment.
He is guiding history across many years.

question.en: What stands out to you about God’s work across generations—and why might this lead into a new step in the story?
